snippet.title: Kill Your Heart – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Love becomes a curse—and you’re its reluctant matchmaker. A survival thriller RPG where you scavenge resources, solve cryptic puzzles, and battle grotesque monsters in a stylish pursuit to unite human hearts.
Wishlist the game and try the demo on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3604470/Kill_Your_Heart/
